name: Licca-chan Oshare House
overview: (Google translated from Japanese WiiWare page) Popular for girls "Rika-chan" appeared in Wii wear! You can enjoy changing clothes of mini games and Rika chan. When you play a mini game you get a fashion item such as Rika's clothes and shoes. When you collect fashion items, dress up Licca pretty! More than 60 kinds of fashion items! There are accessories such as hats and bags. Moreover, I can hear that Rika chan phone using remote control.
